title: Ready Crust® Key Lime Pie
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) READY CRUST® Graham Cracker Pie Crust
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding and pie filling
1 (8 ounce) container frozen non-dairy whipped topping, thawed
instructions:
Pour milk into large bowl. Add pudding mix and lime peel.
Beat with wire whisk 2 minutes or until smooth (Mixture will be thick.) Immediately stir in 1/2 of the whipped topping. Spoon into crust.
Refrigerate 4 hours or until set. Garnish with remaining whipped topping and lime slices.
